value:
$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_Normal,Face|According to the map, we can get to
Burnt-Bone Gorge by following this
trail.$k$pZacharias said that the enemy
doesn't even know this route exists.$k$pWe can follow it straight to the place
where the Rite of Flames is
performed...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Zacharias wouldn't lead us astray.
Let's go!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|We will stop you here. Father's
orders.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|I didn't want to ambush you. I'd
rather face you head-on in a fair fight.
But either way, this is the end.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|How did you...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|But... Zacharias...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|This is not good. We're completely
surrounded!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|We can't let Surtr catch up with us.
If he does, we'll be annihilated. We
must break through!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Look! There's a break in their ranks!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Quick! Before they form up again—
make a run for it!$k$p

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|That...was a close scrape.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|It looks like we're in the clear for
now, though.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I didn't think we would make it...$k$pI'm shocked that Zacharias gave us
faulty info!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Something's not quite right. The
enemy had time to plan and execute
an ambush.$k$pIt wasn't by chance that they found
us. They knew the route we'd be
traveling on—in advance.$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_Normal,Face|That was no coincidence. We must
consider what led to this.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|You sound like you have an idea.$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_Normal,Face|Zacharias could have intentionally
misled us.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Certainly not! He is our ally, and he
would never deceive us. We can
discard that explanation.$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_Normal,Face|He saved my life, too, you know. I
also find it difficult to believe he's in
league with Múspell.$k$pIt is clear, however, that the enemy
knows our location.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|But if they're not getting it from
Zacharias...$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_Normal,Face|Then someone else has shared that
information with them.$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face|Somebody else? Who?$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_Normal,Face|We must consider the possibility that
there is a traitor in our midst.$k$pI believe that someone here must be
working with Múspell.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What? But—$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|No! Who here would betray us?$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_Normal,Face|I would like to believe that no one
would.$k$pBut someone may be preying on our
trust. We haven't been keeping
watch, after all.$k$pThere was ample opportunity for any
of us to slip away and send a
message. I know I had the chance.$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face|Me too...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What are you suggesting?$k$pEveryone here—we, from Nifl, and
they, from Askr—is steadfast!$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_Normal,Face|Yes, my sister. I do want to believe
that. But can we afford to?$k$p$EFace_Cool|If there is a traitor among us, it will
not be long before we meet our end.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Hmm. Hmm...$k$p$Sbs150|
